thread.title: Maruti launches WagonR Avance at starting price of Rs 4.30 lakh
thread.title_full: Maruti launches WagonR Avance at starting price of Rs 4.30 lakh | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Maruti launches WagonR Avance at starting price of Rs 4.30 lakh
text:
Other Articles Audi A6 35 TFSI launched in India at a price of Rs 45.90 lakh Tata Motors global sales rise 1.51% in August; JLR up by 4.59% Audi sales up 2.7 per cent up at 128,650 units in August Maruti Suzuki India today launched a limited edition version of its popular model WagonR, named Avance, with prices starting at Rs 4.30 lakh (ex-showroom Delhi).
Coming just ahead of the festive season, WagonR Avance will be offered for a period of three months. The model is being introduced in two variants — LXi Petrol and LXi CNG, the company said in a statement.
While the LXi petrol variant is priced at Rs 4.30 lakh, LXi CNG comes at Rs 4.84 lakh (ex-showroom Delhi).
Avance comes with features like double din stereo with Bluetooth, dual tone dashboard with a new beige colour, premium seat fabric, rear power windows among others, it said.
Maruti Suzuki India Head of Marketing Vinay Pant said, “In celebration of the festive season we are happy to introduce WagonR Avance with a host of smart new features. We are confident this will help us strengthen the brand.”
 10, 2015 3:24 pm
